glossdef.p: WebHelp_OUTPUT_DIR refers to the output directory where WebHelp transformation files will be generated.

p.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

glossdef.p: The output directory can be specified using the Output Directory text field in the Output tab of the transformation scenario dialog box.
When running the WebHelp transformation from a command line, the output directory can be specified using the -o or --output option.
